channel.title: Onyxscape Development Team
channel.description:
Yes, Ladies and Gentleman, Yet another development team. Yes i know every other one claims they will make the best server ever built....then you never hear from them after a few weeks and you never hear any news....odd huh?
But on to the more important stuff. I am the creator of heaven and hell scape for those who dont know me or my old server then never mind that comment. I had a few ideas for a server and im running with them...even if its alone. Onyxscape (working name) will be different in that: [1] Kinda cool starting place. (still need to find a good city for base) [2] Silver crowns will represent Veteran/Hero/Member Players. [3] Unique shops and such.
More to the point. The server will be an npc based server. With 1 major quests and im sure ill add more to the list. But the main quest will be the Veteran Quest. Which allows you to wear the elite items of the server. Have access to new shops and many other things. They will also have a Silver Crown (usually called the mod crown) by their name. The Staff will all be of the same level. No Mod's or Admin's or such. Just Staff.
Anyways this is just an idea in the making. I already know alot of what i want. Just not where. But Anyways if you are still reading this and actually care. Apply.
[code] Name: Msn: Reason for applying: How Can you help me?: [/code]
Thank you for reading and i hope you join. If not hope you join the server.

item.title: Onyxscape Development Team
item.dc:creator: @god_of_ikiliki god of ikiliki
item.description:
@god_of_ikiliki wrote:

[quote=“Runer King, post:5, topic:172255”][quote author=Goddess link=topic=232396.msg1988766#msg1988766 date=1199954654]
IT WAS FREAKING DODIAN KYLE. i didnt get it. and ive been learning…how rude though. and weither this follows through or not im going to be doing all the coding i just need testers and other basic people for ideas advice and or beta testers. how dare you flame me. you just happened to forget those finite details did you?
[/quote]
Are you in a mental institution…? I mean jeeze, you are a thickheaded retard. You should go join a circus, or a gay pride parade!

Kyle laughs his ass of

Kicks Goddess

Goddess cries

Goddess dies

“Yay!”

Enjoy that little post =-)[/quote]I really think you want a mute, am I right?

Read full topic
